column2: TINDAKMALAYSIA NETWORK SERVICES PLT (TINDAK MALAYSIA)
Tindak Malaysia (2023), State of Sabah Government Gazette (14th October 1971), The Straits Times 6th October 1971, Bahagian Kabinet dan Dasar (Jabatan Ketua Menteri Sabah)

There may be discrepancies for the age of candidates as there is no official data released for the attribute.There may be a presence for missing data points for age attribute for candidates. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives. There was no election as all Sabah Alliance candidates won unopposed
FIELD DESCRIPTION
Composite between Parliamentary Code and DUN Code (Unique Identifier).
State Name
Parliamentary Code (1966 - 1974)
Parliamentary Name (1966 - 1974)
State Constituency Code (1966 - 1974)
State Constituency Code (1966 - 1974)
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the seat
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank
Total Elector Count (No data was found)
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total number of ballot papers issued at the poll
Total number of ballot papers issued but not put in the ballot box and not returned (no information is available)
Total number of rejected ballot papers
Total number of votes by electors
Sabah Alliance Component Party
Sabah Alliance Candidate Name (Unofficial)
Male/Female Classification
Sabah Alliance Candidate Age
SabahAlliance Valid Vote for the Candidate
Indicated if the contestant has lost deposit. If yes, value 'Loss Deposit' is affixed. If none, it is left blank
United Sabah National Organisation
Sabah Chinese Association
